snippet.title: Hollowbody - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description: Solo developer Headware Games bills Hollowbody as a "dystopian love letter to survival horror." Think "Silent Hill with a touch of tech-noir with retro PS2-era graphics" and you've got a decent idea of what Hollowbody is going for. It features a blend of dynamic and fixed camera angles, plenty of puzzles, full voice acting, multiple difficulty options, and more. Hollowbody will be released for PC on Steam on September 12. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2123640/Hollowbody/
